title: 51 Marc Fitt: The Mentality of a World Class Body and Mind
description: Marc Fitt on the School of Greatness podcast with Lewis Howes discussing the sleep patterns, eating habits, exercise consistency and overall mindset that makes Marc so successful in his fitness and his business. For those of you seeking to align your actions with your vision for your body and business, this podcast is a must.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
